author: AngelCalvo
body:
- [x] Resolves issue #abcd.
- [ ] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/README.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/docs).

comments.author: AngelCalvo
comments.body: Made some edits and cleaned up a few paragraph

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
We're using the "one line per sentence or phrase" to make understanding diffs easier.

Can you make those changes here and in future PRs?
